item.title: Towards type-aware declarative codemods via unification
item.description: I’ve been playing with codemod transformations for TypeScript using jscodeshift (from Facebook) and ts-pattern. Working closely with these has made me want a declarative type-aware codemod engine for TypeScript, which I haven’t yet been able to find.
